descriptionHtml:
- Beautiful Lydia 2.0 -

                        - Update -

All crash issues have been fixed and should now be working just fine.
If you have any problems with it, please contact me.

A more young foxy looking Lydia that still looks like Lydia. Some to tweaks making her look
the way she deserves.

Anyhow. Please leave a comment and tell me what you think! 
all response is welcome, negative or positive.

Note: Mods used in this NPC

Better females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812  (None make-up version)

The Eyes Of Beauty: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722 (Highly recommended)

BFG - Better face gen: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
____________________________________________________________

Thanks for watching.
author: Jonay
